00026 #if defined(_FBRF_HARDWARE_H)
00027 #ifndef _FREEBUS_ATMEGA8_H
00028 #define _FREEBUS_ATMEGA8_H ///< is defined if target system is the ATMega8
00029 
00030 /*************************************************************************
00031 * INCLUDES
00032 *************************************************************************/
00033 #include <inttypes.h>
00034 #include <avr/io.h>
00035 #include <avr/eeprom.h>
00036 #include <avr/pgmspace.h>
00037 #include <avr/interrupt.h> 
00038 #include <avr/wdt.h>
00039 #include <avr/sleep.h>
00040 #include <util/parity.h>
00041 #include <util/delay.h>
00042 #include <string.h>
00043 
00044 /**************************************************************************
00045 * DEFINITIONS
00046 **************************************************************************/
00047 #define ENABLE_ALL_INTERRUPTS()     sei()                   
00048 #define DISABLE_IRQS    unsigned char _sreg = SREG; cli();  
00049 #define ENABLE_IRQS     { if(_sreg & 0x80) sei(); }         
00052 #define CONFIGURE_INT0()            {                                 \
00053           MCUCR |= (1<<ISC01);      /* Enable Int0 falling edge */    \
00054           MCUCR &= ~(1<<ISC00);     /* Enable Int0 falling edge */    \
00055           GICR  |= (1<<INT0);      /* Enable Int0 */                 \
00056      }
00057 
00059 #define DISABLE_RX_INT()            {           \
00060           GICR &= ~(1U<<INT0);                  \
00061      }
00062 
00064 #define ENABLE_RX_INT()             {           \
00065           GIFR |= (1U<<INTF0);                  \
00066           GICR |= (1U<<INT0);                   \
00067      }
00068 
00075 #define RELOAD_TIMER0(value, tccr0) {                                   \
00076           TCCR0 = 0;             /* stop timer */                       \
00077           TCNT0 = value;         /* set start of timer, run to 0xFF */  \
00078           TIMSK |= (1<<TOIE0);   /* enable overflow interrupt */        \
00079           TCCR0 = tccr0;         /* set mode and reenable timer */      \
00080      }
00081 
00083 #define TIMER1_OVERRUN              (TIFR & (1U<<OCF1A))
00084 
00086 #define CLEAR_TIMER1_OVERRUN        TIFR |= (1U<<OCF1A)
00087 
00089 #define RELOAD_APPLICATION_TIMER()  {                                   \
00090           TCCR1A = 0;             /* CTC (Clear Timer on Compate match) */ \
00091           TCCR1B = (1U<<WGM12)|(1U<<CS11)|(1U<<CS10); /* CTC-mode, prescale to 64 */ \
00092           OCR1A  = 16249;         /* every 130 ms OCR1A=(delay*F_CPU)/(prescaler)-1 */ \
00093           TCNT1  = 0;             /* reset timer */                     \
00094      }
00095 
00102 #define ENABLE_PWM(x)               {                                   \
00103           TCCR2 = (1<<WGM20)|(1<<COM21)|(1<<COM20)|(1<<CS21); /* set to PWM mode and enable OC2 pin, prescaler 8 */ \
00104           TCNT2 = 0;              /* reset timer2 */                    \
00105           OCR2  = (x);            /* defines the duty cycle */          \
00106      }
00107 
00109 #define DISABLE_PWM()               {                                 \
00110           TCCR2 &= ~((1<<COM21)|(1<<COM20));   /* disable PWM pin  */ \
00111           SETPIN_CTRL(ON);                     /* set port to high */ \
00112      }
00113 
00115 #define ENABLE_UART_TX_IRQ()        {                            \
00116           UCSRB |= (1<<TXCIE);     /* enable transmit IRQ */     \
00117      }
00118 
00120 #define DISABLE_UART_TX_IRQ()       {                            \
00121           UCSRB &= ~(1<<TXCIE);    /* disable transmit IRQ */    \
00122      }
00123 
00125 #define UART_SEND_BYTE(tx_char)     {           \
00126           UDR = (uint8_t)(tx_char);             \
00127      }
00128 
00130 #define ENABLE_WATCHDOG(x)          {           \
00131           wdt_enable(x);                        \
00132      }
00133 
00134 
00136 #define DISABLE_WATCHDOG()          {           \
00137           MCUCSR = 0;                           \
00138           wdt_disable();                        \
00139      }
00140
